name: @logusbrain/primeng-core
title: Fully PrimeNG-Based Angular Library by Logusbrain
description: Logusbrain PrimeNG-Core is a modular, reusable Angular library built entirely on PrimeNG to enhance productivity, consistency, and scalability in Angular applications. It bundles components, utility services, and standard configurations to accelerate development in professional environments.
author: Logusbrain <kastin.ntambwe@outlook.com>
